txt.en: Maddoc has asked you lessen the number of wolves who den at Wylvenclove, north of Herne.\n\nWylvenclove is in western Cardolan.
'Thank you, traveller! I hope this quells their brazenness. Herne needs no further tribulations.'
The once furtive pack of wolves who live north of Herne has been driven to a deadly frenzy.
You should let Maddoc know you have defeated many of the vicious wolves who lived near Herne.\n\nMaddoc is inside the Inn at Herne.

'Life in Herne was never easy, but lately some darkness has passed through the land, stirring up all manner of foul things! There is a wolf pack north of Herne which does not usually trouble the town or those on the road. However, they have of late become vicious, attacking passersby and raiding the town come nightfall.\n\n'If you could thin out the pack, that would help immensely.'
